amendment.description: Amendment requires that research into refueling and recharging infrastructure for alternative and hybrid fuel vehicles include the unique challenges facing rural areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-255 to require that research into refueling and recharging infrastructure for alternative and hybrid fuel vehicles include the unique challenges facing rural areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Marshall amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Marshall.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Marshall amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
